channel.title: Compiler wont work need help with! waiting for 6 months!
channel.description:
when i run my compiler it says:
javac" is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file note:stream.java uses or overides a deprecated API note:recompile with -Xlint: derprecation for details. ReapageScape V2 - - -Now Online
then it switches to part where i can hit c for compile r for runserver etc. etc. etc. i hit c for compile then it says you do not have jdk 5.0 or jdk 6.0 and i do have it downloaded so plzz help me!!!

item.title: Compiler wont work need help with! waiting for 6 months!
item.dc:creator: @Miix_Tom Miix Tom
item.description:
@Miix_Tom wrote:

dude do this in ur compiler:

@echo off title Home Made "C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac" -d ./classes ./*.java echo Done echo. echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: echo :: :: echo :: Thanks For Using Tom's Home Made Complier! :: echo :: :: echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: pause
change "C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac"
to where your java is

Read full topic
item.source: Compiler wont work need help with! waiting for 6 months!
